Usage: anyrepo foreach [OPTIONS] [COMMAND]...

  Run 'command' on projects.

  Please use '--' to separate anyrepo command line options from options
  forwarded to the `command` (i.e. `anyrepo foreach -- ls -l`)

Options:
  -P, --project DIRECTORY  Project path to operate on only. All by default.
                           This option can be specified multiple times.
  -M, --manifest FILE      Manifest file. Initial clone/init filter settings
                           by default.
  -h, --help               Show this message and exit.
